title: The amount of bias against assassins on these boards is astounding
body: Like, it really is. Assassins have been pretty weak for a long time now (mainly assassins in the mid lane, not jungler assassins. AP assassins like Fizz and Diana are also quite weak atm), yet people bitch on these boards and act as if they are completely overpowered.

replies.body:
Assassins are just frustrating to die to. They may be balanced, but if all someone on the enemy team sees is some skinny waifish guy deal a ton of burst damage and uses his ninjitsu to turn into a log to get away, it can be pretty annoying for the victim.

That being said, if you play a tanky guy and see an assassin, you can easily bitch slap that assassin into quantum uncertainty. It's all a matter of perspective.

> [{quoted}](name=Quiet Dude,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EYbUykIU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-31T17:27:56.778+0000)
>
> Assassins are just frustrating to die to. They may be balanced, but if all someone on the enemy team sees is some skinny waifish guy deal a ton of burst damage and uses his ninjitsu to turn into a log to get away, it can be pretty annoying for the victim.
> 
> That being said, if you play a tanky guy and see an assassin, you can easily bitch slap that assassin into quantum uncertainty. It's all a matter of perspective.

I wish there is a class of champions that can make an assassin's job harder to do. Wait a minute...

{{champion:12}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:497}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:44}} 

How is the assassin getting through any of these champs? Oh right because the adc has no brains and thought it was a good idea to farm a wave away from the safety of his tower ALONE while the enemy Assassin is MIA.

> [{quoted}](name=2Charmnot2Charm,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EYbUykIU,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-03-31T17:50:01.378+0000)

> 
> How is the assassin getting through any of these champs? Oh right because the adc has no brains and thought it was a good idea to farm a wave away from the safety of his tower ALONE while the enemy Assassin is MIA.

Pretty sure most assassins give no fucks about towers, as they will instant kill you and then get away after taking 1 tower shot. i was playing ez and the enemy 0-3 zed ulted me so i E flashed under my tower dodged every shuriken and he AA ignite me and electrocute + ult pop killed me under tower while he recalled back to his shadow after taking 4 tower shots and surviving. i had a fizz trying to tower dive me early as lvl fucking 3 and he nearly killed me everytime, if i didnt take barrier i woulda died for sure. towers do nothing in this game besides provide fake safety and free gold.

Zed is a bad example, he is like the best assassin in mid lane while all others are on a weaker spot. It almost felt like to Riot he is the only assasin in mid lane and every balance they do for assasin is around Zed.
"safety of his tower" top meme of the day brother

have you noticed its always adc mains who bitch about other roles being overpowered? they literally have a problem with every other class in the game existing because they think they should just be able to do everything. its pure entitlement
Are you serious? Every 2nd post on these boards is about how ADCs are op? You really cant be serious lol
ADCs aren't an Assassin's only target
I think that's what I said in the second paragraph

> [{quoted}](name=Quiet Dude,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EYbUykIU,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-03-31T18:00:24.873+0000)
>
> I think that's what I said in the second paragraph

Figured you were talking about top laners since all you said was tanky my bad though. Enchanters can also easily deal with assassins.
Oh I still use the old nomenclature, ha ha. Enchanters/Wardens means supports/tanks in my head still.

more than half of these champs are themselves preys for the assassins.

It's always charming to have a 6/0/0 zed coming on your lane early as soraka and getting os under tower out from nowhere.

Most assassins can close the distance and os your adc if ahead without you being able to do anything. The best case, you survive but you have to back and the enemy can just free farm and push. Lovely.

Mid lane mages also have to spend the first half of the game with mid lane assassins. 

The support isn't omnipresent.
Kha'zix has also been broken as fuck for about 4 months. Every other assassin has sucked whether it be support cockblock or poor laning because they're melee.

I find it funny because I saw this assassin main comment on this old thread a while back saying that he will always consider assassins weak "until I can one shot a tank". Then we are asked why we dislike assassins, they can't get over the fact that they can't always just delete anything they see who isn't their ally lol. But honestly I stopped trying to reason with different players about their main class, it's just pointless.

> [{quoted}](name=VØIÐ,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EYbUykIU,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-03-31T17:54:18.404+0000)
>
> I find it funny because I saw this assassin main comment on this old thread a while back saying that he will always consider assassins weak "until I can one shot a tank". Then we are asked why we dislike assassins, they can't get over the fact that they can't always just delete anything they see who isn't their ally lol. But honestly I stopped trying to reason with different players about their main class, it's just pointless.


#ONE GUY doesn't represent ALL of them.
Most of the board players are ADC mains.. so yep the amount of bias against assassins and tanks are absurd. Sadly most rioters are adc and support mains, so even more bias there.

> [{quoted}](name=WiegrafOfValor,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EYbUykIU,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-03-31T18:05:13.608+0000)
>
> Most of the board players are ADC mains.. so yep the amount of bias against assassins and tanks are absurd. Sadly most rioters are adc and support mains, so even more bias there.

WAT

The same Boards that hate adcs because they take no skill, only braindead rightclick, want them to be nerfed and not mandatory are all adc mains????????
duh.. adc players are highly self loathing and self destructive, didn't you know that?

> [{quoted}](name=Failsawce,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EYbUykIU,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2018-03-31T19:11:08.326+0000)
>
> duh.. adc players are highly self loathing and self destructive, didn't you know that?

Damm, you got us:  we are all Kog'Maw mains.
You're not wrong.
Post the same thread with “amount of bias against ADCs” and you’ll get shoved into downvote hell. That’s how strong the bias is.
On the other hand, I know full and well it's pretty routine for assassins to complain they can't 1v2 the ADC and Support since that's expected for some reason.

That's because up until the last couple  seasons, **it *was* expected**. Supports were wardbots that essentially didn't exist past the 15 minute mark, and their power has steadily creeped up to that of a standard champion ever since the introduction of support items in S3.

Yep.  The job was kill the ADC.  And then die.   You did your job in KOing the most valuable target on the enemy team, now it is up to your team to make use of that to clear out the game.

Riot has spent a ton of time giving Assassins ways to get back out, outplay, ect.  And made them give up their reliability at their one true job.  Kill the ADC.   Turns out, when both the Assassin and the ADC survive the fight... the ADC is the winner.  Because the Assassin can't take a round two because the ADC sustains back up while the Assassin now has no ult that is generally crucial to kill the carries.


Meanwhile, many ADCs have been gaining practically assassin like traits in hyper-burst (per second), such as Shiv-IE on a crit build and it being able to 2 shot just about any non-tank champ in the late game.

Honestly, I think that is the thing that tilts Assassin players the most.  The very thing that was taken from them was freely given to the ADCs, all they have to do is survive to 3 items to do it, and they become near unassailable even in the assassin's best case scenario.

Fizz is weak at the moment? Give me the number of your dealer. He's so weak that he has the 2nd highest win rate in master tier, 7th highest in platinum, 4th highest in gold. I seriously would love it if people like would do some research before spouting off BS that's not based in reality.

> [{quoted}](name=MirrorU,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EYbUykIU,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2018-03-31T18:42:31.724+0000)
>
> Fizz is weak at the moment? Give me the number of your dealer. He's so weak that he has the 2nd highest win rate in master tier, 7th highest in platinum, 4th highest in gold. I seriously would love it if people like would do some research before spouting off BS that's not based in reality.

As an Assassin main I lol'ed @ Fizz being weak. That piece of trash can legit miss his ult and still one-shot a squishy just by dashing through and jumping in their general direction. Not fun, not rewarding, not skillful at all. 

Though I agree that some assassin's (AD assassins mainly) struggle. Though things should get better with the upcoming Tabi nerfs.
I 100% agree.

this counts for both sides...

Many people constantly complain like theyre actually unpplayable, and then vice versa.
Never will forgot the post that complained that they got counterpicked because they were first picked, and wanted to nerf assassins for it

> [{quoted}](name=Yaśuo Main,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EYbUykIU,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-03-31T17:49:27.565+0000)
>
> Never will forgot the post that complained that they got counterpicked because they were first picked, and wanted to nerf assassins for it

Link? No thread has ever said this.

Willioss, the guy who posted "Stop Buffing Zed" argued that his argument Is valid because he was first pick and picked an immobile mage while the enemy picked zed. Gets 40 upvotes. 

That bias is so utterly toxic that I can't explain why it's even a thing.

> [{quoted}](name=Yaśuo Main,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EYbUykIU,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2018-03-31T22:56:52.035+0000)
>
> Willioss, the guy who posted "Stop Buffing Zed" argued that his argument Is valid because he was first pick and picked an immobile mage while the enemy picked zed. Gets 40 upvotes. 
> 
> That bias is so utterly toxic that I can't explain why it's even a thing.

Nowhere did he say in the thread "i was counterpicked by zed."
He said that in a comment. Not his thread.
Why? Because assassins are a pain in the arse to deal.  Even more if they get the slight lead.

Assassins are balanced...when they don't get snowballed. A really fed Fizz can often kill via sheer brute force once he gets fed enough. This basically leaves whoever he wants to murder with zero counter play as they'll be dead before they can retaliate.

> [{quoted}](name=Done25,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EYbUykIU,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-03-31T18:26:17.829+0000)
>
> Assassins are balanced...when they don't get snowballed. A really fed Fizz can often kill via sheer brute force once he gets fed enough. This basically leaves whoever he wants to murder with zero counter play as they'll be dead before they can retaliate.

problem i hve with assassins, i made a talon go 0-4 in lane yesterday as ap ezreal, he rushed tiamat pushed in wave roamed bot an got a few kills off it. no matter how much i pinged warded or warned bot lane he was gone, they never listened and dumbass nami took iginite into a annie varus lane with a kha zix jungler and talon mid so they pretty much had no sort of peel outside of bubble. so they just got dived while i kept taking towers their failure sooner or later flooded into mid lane an now talon is 4-4 and still keeping up in cs cause of tiamat rush. and we lose cause no1 wanted to peel for the fed ezreal after i asssassinated 1 guy going for me normally talon, the kha zix just pressed Q and did 80% of my hp though my seraph embrace.
I hate assassins esp ad ones. they brainless cancer that when ahead are unstopable and annoying an when behind sooner or later will get ahead due to nature of their bull shit kits all they have to do is find that 1 idiot on enemy team to go farm.

> [{quoted}](name=Its All Skillzz,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EYbUykIU,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2018-03-31T18:30:35.022+0000)

> problem i hve with assassins, i made a talon go 0-4 in lane yesterday as ap ezreal, he rushed tiamat pushed in wave roamed bot an got a few kills off it. no matter how much i pinged warded or warned bot lane he was gone, they never listened and dumbass nami took iginite into a annie varus lane with a kha zix jungler and talon mid so they pretty much had no sort of peel outside of bubble. so they just got dived while i kept taking towers their failure sooner or later flooded into mid lane an now talon is 4-4 and still keeping up in cs cause of tiamat rush. and we lose cause no1 wanted to peel for the fed ezreal after i asssassinated 1 guy going for me normally talon, the kha zix just pressed Q and did 80% of my hp though my seraph embrace.
> I hate assassins esp ad ones. they brainless cancer that when ahead are unstopable and annoying an when behind sooner or later will get ahead due to nature of their bull shit kits all they have to do is find that 1 idiot on enemy team to go farm.

The issue with Ad assassins is that so long as they are against a team that has no tanks and CC to keep them in check they will be cancerous to deal with, but at the same time they are completely useless against a tanky team and CC heavy comps due to how squishy they are. 

And please. Assasin's do not snowball if they fall behind unless your team misplays. Tabi and Seeker's, 2 items costing 1100 et 1200 Gold can stop 5800 Gold worth of lethality, if an Assassin is doing alright and your rush one of these you have  stopped their potential snowball, if they were behind you have effectively killed them off. People just dont want to rush defensive for some reason.

> [{quoted}](name=Its All Skillzz,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EYbUykIU,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2018-03-31T18:30:35.022+0000)

You made a talon go 0-4 and he got a FEW kills on bot, no shit sherlock your bot laners were the problem not the AD Assassin.

When you try to use logic on the Gameplay Boards:

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/913/758/a12.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=T34M5RH34VY,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EYbUykIU,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-03-31T17:23:23.258+0000)
>
> Like, it really is. Assassins have been pretty weak for a long time now (mainly assassins in the mid lane, not jungler assassins. AP assassins like Fizz and Diana are also quite weak atm), yet people bitch on these boards and act as if they are completely overpowered.

Your bias is worse. If it wasn't, you'd have noticed that the boards bitch about every class and every sub-class.

It's like the "sniper phenomenon" in every single shooter you'll ever play.

People just don't like being one shot. It doesn't matter if they make themselves vulnerable, aren't watching the map, haven't placed wards or get spectacularly outplayed. It wouldn't even matter if assassins were extremely underpowered, someone somewhere is getting oneshot and boy are they going to complain.
(diana is not an assassin though)
Yeah, she is just a diver whose only quality is to one-shot you, get it right!

Winrates for midlane assassins

Fizz 52.92%
Kassadin 49.02%
Talon 51.89%
Ekko 51.89%
Katarina 51.97%
Leblanc 51.19%
Ahri 51.84%
Diana 50.77%
Zed 49.5%

"Assassins have been pretty weak for a long time now." Sure they are.
Win rates don't matter _that_ much when deciding whether or not a champion is powerful. Aatrox jungle has a 53.7% winrate- is it overpowered?
Aatrox jungle has a 0.5% play rate. That can't be said for any of the champions listed above.

> [{quoted}](name=DeerGreenwood,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EYbUykIU,comment-id=000b0001,timestamp=2018-03-31T20:01:43.577+0000)
>
> Win rates don't matter _that_ much when deciding whether or not a champion is powerful. Aatrox jungle has a 53.7% winrate- is it overpowered?

Aatrox also doesnt have a high pickrate either. Assassins in general have a high /normal pickrate so their winrates matter Also in response to the LB with q silence thing. Leblanc had clear weaknesses and was useless when behind. She was a 100% feast or famine champion

Taking win rates as a prove of something being broken, good,bad or terrible is stupid. Win rate means nothing. Let me remind you that old Leblanc with silence had 45% win rate and was one of the most obnoxious and overpowered champions in the game that had basically ban rate close to pre rework kassadin.

> [{quoted}](name=T4underbolt,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EYbUykIU,comment-id=000b0002,timestamp=2018-03-31T21:15:08.249+0000)
>
> Taking win rates as a prove of something being broken, good,bad or terrible is stupid. Win rate means nothing. Let me remind you that old Leblanc with silence had 45% win rate and was one of the most obnoxious and overpowered champions in the game that had basically ban rate close to pre rework kassadin.

Right, but when something has a high ban rate **and** low win rate, that means that something on it is broken-OP and that "every scrublord" and "bronze 4 gatekeeper" is trying to play that thing--and decreasing the winrate.

I would take issue with a few champs on the list they gave above, but not many. You clearly have an agenda here, though, and I know that I'm not serving it.
